System requirements on windows - 64 gbs of RAM

Each file can be run in sequential order. You will need to change file paths to adapt to your local machine as needed. 

The player data files need to be bought and individually downloaded from PFF via https://premium.pff.com/nfl/positions/2024/PRE. 

Download all the weekly regular season game reports from 2016 to 2023.
